[Y]Disk and AMSDOS
[W]Faster workflow, better iteration.
[c][m.]
[W]AMSDOS added disk commands that made
[W]development loops shorter and less
[W]painful.
[W]Directory structures and headers
[W]reward careful organisation and
[W]consistent naming.
[c][m.]
[G]- Use clear filenames.
[G]- Track versions by date.
[G]- Protect finished masters.
[m][m-]
[Y]DID YOU KNOW?
[C]Firmware variables keep drive and user
[C]state ready for tools.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
